quotes.content: 灯和灯没必要相逢。他们看不见对方。
人们认为故事是由人塑造的。事实恰好相反。

quotes.author: 王融
quotes.title: 咏琵琶
quotes.content: 掩抑有奇态，凄怆多好声。

quotes.author: 王山
quotes.title: 梦中作
quotes.content: 历劫易翻沧海水，浓春难谢碧桃花。

quotes.author: 罗隐
quotes.title: 筹笔驿
quotes.content:
抛掷南阳为主忧，北征东讨尽良筹。
时来天地皆同力，运去英雄不自由。
千里山河轻孺子，两冠剑恨谯周。
唯余岩下多情水，犹解年年傍驿流。

quotes.author: 安吉拉·卡特
quotes.title: 马戏团之夜
quotes.content: 你叫什么名字？你有灵魂吗？你能够爱吗？

quotes.author: William Makepeace Thackeray
quotes.content: To love and win is the best thing. To love and lose, the next best.

quotes.author: Jalāl ad-Dīn Mohammad Rūmī
quotes.content: I was raw, I became cooked, I was burnt.

quotes.author: Jalāl ad-Dīn Mohammad Rūmī
quotes.content: The wound is the place where the Light enters you.
